pages.text: Now we need to mix both fluids in the $(item)backmix reactor$(). You can connect the $(item)oil mill$() and the $(item)blast furnace$() with fluid pipes to the backmix reactor. Do not forget to put $(item)fluid extractors$() at the mill and the furnace to get the fluids flowing! The $(item)backmix reactor$() also needs to be connected to a $(l:fuel_production/2_canola_oil#dynamo)dynamo$() to work.
